content: I figure I can try raisin' a crab too. {A笑眯眯}It'll remind me to get better at beachcombin', so I don't get bullied by them every time~!
info: 云果小故事-抓螃蟹后闲聊_云果故事线

content: So I think I'll just raise it instead~! {A心虚目移}I mean, I did pick up some fish-raisin' from the aquaponics stuff... <style=SizeSmall>and I only lost a few... That's not bad, right?...</style>
info: 云果小故事-抓螃蟹后闲聊_云果故事线

content: {A想象中}<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, you know the crab you caught for me? I feel like there's a...{短暂停} special connection between us.
info: 云果小故事-抓螃蟹后闲聊_云果故事线

content: I was thinkin' mah... well, I don't wanna eat it anymore, or turn it into fertilizer. I just couldn't bring myself to do it.
info: 云果小故事-抓螃蟹后闲聊_云果故事线
